item.title: Amish mother indicted by grand jury in ‘spiritual delusion’ drowning death of 4-year-old son
item.description: A Tuscarawas County Grand Jury has indicted an Amish mother accused of drowning her young son.

item.title: Why more Americans are turning to digital banks
item.description: Digital banks are surging – often advertising higher yields and fewer fees. So, how do you pick the right one for your money? Consumer Investigator Caresse Jackman talks with The Motley Fool about what to look for before you move your cash.

item.title: Hall of Fame wide receiver Randy Moss completes cancer treatment
item.description: Pro Football Hall of Famer Randy Moss recently completed his cancer treatment in Charlotte.

item.description: The Rotary Club hosted it’s Second Annual Charity Golf Tournament at the Wellen Park Golf & Country Club.

item.title: Couple in their 80s turn tables on con artists trying to steal Rolex: ‘I’ll give you an attitude’
item.description: A pair of con artists learned the hard way that a couple in their 80s were the wrong people to target for their watch.

item.title: Pope Leo XIV declares 15-year-old computer whiz, known as God’s influencer, a saint
item.description: The pope canonized Carlo Acutis, who died in 2006, during a Mass attended by tens of thousands of people, many of them millennials and couples with young children.

item.title: ADApt and play event kicks off
